Quote.Author: Shigeru Miyamoto
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everyone can enjoy games

Quote.Author: Shigeru Miyamoto
Quote.QuoteValue: Japanese people have a funny habit of abbreviating names

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: Television has made dictatorship impossible but democracy unbearable

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a brother younger than me. My mother was a librarian, so from her, I got the taste to read

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: You know when civilization began? With the invention of the mirror

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: In the Middle East, the conflict today is a matter of generations and not of cultures

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, dreaming is simply being pragmatic

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned that public service is a privilege that must be based on moral foundations

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: Science doesn't have flags. Science doesn't have borders

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: What you can do with relations is greater than what you can do with guns

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no alternative to peace. There is no sense to go to war

Quote.Author: Shimon Peres
Quote.QuoteValue: I never was after money. It never attracted me

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't be afraid to go out on a limb. It's where all the fruit is

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: The more I traveled the more I realized that fear makes strangers of people who should be friends

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: A person who knows how to laugh at himself will never ceased to be amused

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to get husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they are too old to do it

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: The person who knows how to laugh at himself will never cease to be amused

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, the safest place is out on a limb

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I want women to be liberated and still be able to have a nice ass and shake it

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do like diva trips and stuff

Quote.Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote.QuoteValue: The soul is everlasting, and its learning experience is lifetime after lifetime

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: The rich swell up with pride, the poor from hunger

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how bad things get you got to go on living, even if it kills you

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: A bachelor is a man who comes to work each morning from a different direction

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: You can take a Jew out of a shtetl, but you cannot take a shtetl out of a Jew

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: Here lies a plain and simple Jew who wrote in plain and simple prose

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: No one knows whom the shoe pinches - no one

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: When the heart is full, the eyes overflow

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: Gossip is nature's telephone

Quote.Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote.QuoteValue: Ah, how many luxuries has the good God prepared for his Jewish children

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is pretty surreal and awesome

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: It can be difficult navigating the line between tabloid gossip and authenticity

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope I am a psychotherapist's dream. I've spent enough hours in therapy

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an advocate of 'it's not what you are, it's who you are.'

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: I liked myself much more before I got famous. I was much friendlier and had more energy

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: Fame made me develop a panic disorder

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sensitive and get easily upset and insulted

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: I get to do what I love and communicate whatever I want

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: In my sobriety, I have discovered that the people I love, and who hurt me, were sick like me

Quote.Author: Sia
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Titanium' wasn't supposed to be me singing, but they put my demo vocal back on

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: I've only been in love with a beer bottle and a mirror

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: I just cash in on the fact that I'm good looking, and I've got a nice figure and girls like me

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: I got this feeling I'm gonna die before I get old. I don't know why. I just have this feeling

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: I was the only guy with any bit of anarchy left

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not chic, I could never be chic

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll die before I'm 25, and when I do I'll have lived the way I wanted to

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not vicious really. I consider myself to be kindhearted. I love my mum

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't arrest me, I'm a rockstar

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: We are better than anyone, ain't we? Except for the Eagles, the Eagles are better than us

Quote.Author: Sid Vicious
Quote.QuoteValue: You just pick up a chord, go twang, and you're got music

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: Individual honors and scoring championships are great, but my No. 1 goal is to win the Stanley Cup

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to stay pretty level-headed and just do what I have to do

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to be the best and to get the most out of myself

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up in Canada, I didn't watch football much

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: Breakaway goals are fun

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll be the first one to admit my first couple of years I was pretty hard on the refs

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not that hard to stay grounded. It's the way I was brought up

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be the best, so whatever comes with that, I'll have to accept

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: I am putting pressure on myself to do my best and perform to my potential

Quote.Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think you're human if you don't get nervous

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: Be happy. It's one way of being wise

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: Never touch a butterfly's wing with your finger

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: A happy childhood is poor preparation for human contacts

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: Look for a long time at what pleases you, and a longer time at what pains you

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: To a poet, silence is an acceptable response, even a flattering one

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: Our perfect companions never have fewer than four feet

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: Sincerity is not a spontaneous flower nor is modesty either

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: The lovesick, the betrayed, and the jealous all smell alike

Quote.Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote.QuoteValue: If I can't have too many truffles, I'll do without truffles

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I find all that slightly destructive but mad love alluring

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't wait to be seen as a woman. But I know I probably have to contribute to that with behaviour

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to creatively grow and be inspired. I don't want to do anything generic or dumb

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a big church wedding

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I need my food to keep my energy up, so I can't really diet

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Human nature is such that monogamy is a really hard thing to achieve

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have your heart broken for the first time, you gain depth

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I do think sometimes people get morally superior without understanding situations

Quote.Author: Sienna Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had some real hair disasters

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: People confuse ego, lust, insecurity with true love

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: Shave off your beard and wear a dress. You would be a great female impersonator

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: My own saying is: 'Create the hype, but don't ever believe it.'

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always hated celebrities lecturing people on politics

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: My attitude is, if someone's going to criticize me, tell me to my face

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: I do a couple of hundred press-ups a day but I haven't been to a gym in years

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: Most things in music go full circle eventually

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: If you've got a big mouth and you're controversial, you're going to get attention

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: If your lifeguard duties were as good as your singing, a lot of people would be drowning

Quote.Author: Simon Cowell
Quote.QuoteValue: As an actor, I really like Philip Seymour Hoffman. I think he's a genius

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: Social media is not about the exploitation of technology but service to community

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: The keys to brand success are self-definition, transparency, authenticity and accountability

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: Work with your competitors when the interest of the community and planet are at stake

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a truly powerful phenomenon when a brand makes a stand for what it believes in

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: Consumers want a better world, not just better widgets

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: The false separation between living and giving must end

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: Brands must become architects of community

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: Technology is teaching us to be human again

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: Business practices and how we treat the planet are also in desperate need of re-humanization

Quote.Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote.QuoteValue: The currency of universal values make brands innately sharable

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: To catch a husband is an art; to hold him is a job

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish that every human life might be pure transparent freedom

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: I am incapable of conceiving infinity, and yet I do not accept finity

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: Society cares for the individual only so far as he is profitable

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: The most mediocre of males feels himself a demigod as compared with women

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: One is not born a woman, but becomes one

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: When an individual is kept in a situation of inferiority, the fact is that he does become inferior

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: Buying is a profound pleasure

Quote.Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote.QuoteValue: All oppression creates a state of war

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: To be rooted is perhaps the most important and least recognized need of the human soul

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: Humility is attentive patience

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: Every perfect life is a parable invented by God

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: I can, therefore I am

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: Petroleum is a more likely cause of international conflict than wheat

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: Real genius is nothing else but the supernatural virtue of humility in the domain of thought

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: Oppression that is clearly inexorable and invincible does not give rise to revolt but to submission

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: All sins are attempts to fill voids

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: Charity. To love human beings in so far as they are nothing. That is to love them as God does

Quote.Author: Simone Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: The highest ecstasy is the attention at its fullest

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: The white man knows how to make everything, but he does not know how to distribute it

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: Every seed is awakened, and all animal life

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: Each man is good in His sight. It is not necessary for eagles to be crows

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: I am here by the will of the Great Spirit, and by his will I am chief

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: He put in your heart certain wishes and plans; in my heart, he put other different desires

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: This nation is like a spring freshet; it overruns its banks and destroys all who are in its path

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish it to be remembered that I was the last man of my tribe to surrender my rifle

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not necessary for eagles to be crows

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: In my early days, I was eager to learn and to do things, and therefore I learned quickly

Quote.Author: Sitting Bull
Quote.QuoteValue: I was very sorry when I found out that your intentions were good and not what I supposed they were

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: Risk isn't a word in my vocabulary. It's my very existence

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in having regrets

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: Guitars are like women. You'll never get them totally right

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: I never want to draw attention to myself, but that's all I do

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: As for Guns N' Roses, I don't think there's ever a chance of a reunion

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: We had a really vast music collection and I was raised around rock'n'roll, it's just the way it was

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: I do consider myself British. I have very strong feelings about my British heritage

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not overly greedy

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: I always loved rock guitar. I just never put it together that that's what I'd end up doing

Quote.Author: Slash
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not ridiculously wealthy, but I don't squander money either

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: We do as much, we eat as much, we want as much

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is powerful and it prevails

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the mind that makes the body

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not going to die, I'm going home like a shooting star

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: Religion without humanity is very poor human stuff

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: I know and do what is right better than many big men who read

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: The rich rob the poor, and the poor rob one another

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: When I got religion, I found some work to do to benefit somebody

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: Good man! Genuine gentleman! God bless George Thompson, the great-hearted friend of my race

Quote.Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell you I can't read a book, but I can read de people

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: Dubai's a pretty powerful place

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: Any decision I make is based on myself, and the only person I have to give an explanation to is God

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: My blog is actually all self-photography unless it's a photo shoot

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're younger, you get shoved a lot. You don't really have a say-so

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: You get educated by traveling

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: Through style, you can communicate to the world who you are and what you stand for

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: Motherhood is such an evolving journey

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a lot more interested in style than fashion - style is what makes us who we are

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear short shorts. After 10 years of strenuous ballet, it's the least my legs can do for me

Quote.Author: Solange Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: Luckily, I dated all of the losers ages ago. My love life has been stable for a while

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm young at heart. I'm young in spirit, and I'm still adventurous

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: The Latina in me is an ember that blazes forever

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't prejudge issues. I come to every case with an open mind. Every case is new to me

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never, ever focused on the negative of things. I always look at the positive

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: Until we get equality in education, we won't have an equal society

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: I firmly believe in the rule of law as the foundation for all of our basic rights

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not the heart that compels conclusions in cases, it's the law

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: We apply law to facts. We don't apply feelings to facts

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: Personal experiences affect the facts that judges choose to see

Quote.Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an ordinary person who has been blessed with extraordinary opportunities and experiences

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: If you go about trying to please everyone, there's going to be endless struggles

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I've learned over my career is that simplicity is the key: on the field, off as well

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I've always had a - not really thought of myself as this big star, big identity in the game

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely want to play rugby at the top level, international rugby

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents were always living from pay cheque to pay cheque. They were always struggling

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes they are big hurdles, but good players can overcome them. I am trying to do my best

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest challenge for myself is to be the best father I can be and be the best husband I can be

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: My mindset at this stage, especially after having a daughter... it's just changed my whole outlook

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: In rugby union, I was out wide kicking stones with the pretty boys

Quote.Author: Sonny Bill Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: It was a fairly normal happy upbringing. Not a lot of money, but a lot of love

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: The time making money should be greater than the time that you are spending money

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned the hard way that taking shortcuts and living for free is not really living free

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: I had 60,000 friends on MySpace

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really good at hiring good people

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity and business acumen don't always go hand in hand

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: Making small talk about what someone is wearing is just another form of unsolicited feedback

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't you dare alter your inner freak

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: You are not a special snowflake

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: I work in silence

Quote.Author: Sophia Amoruso
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents taught me the value of money and working hard. And I kind of got that in me intuitively

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: When you realize who the good people are in your life, you're so lucky

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short, and I'm Italian. I'd much rather eat pasta and drink wine than be a size 0

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: The only two men I have time for are Barack Obama and my trainer

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to play everything. I really want to do it all

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: People just deserve to be treated with kindness

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting wasted is only OK when you're young enough to not know better

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Life throws some curveballs at you and you go where it takes you

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I get to do what I love every day. I get to crawl into someone else's head and I love that

Quote.Author: Sophia Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I love boxing. There's something fierce about using your body's force that way

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: Spaghetti can be eaten most successfully if you inhale it like a vacuum cleaner

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: I eat a lot of salad, a little meat, and some fruit. That's all. But I like sweets

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything you see I owe to spaghetti

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: Sex appeal is fifty percent what you've got and fifty percent what people think you've got

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: The two big advantages I had at birth were to have been born wise and to have been born in poverty

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very shy person and I never tried to do theater

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: Mistakes are part of the dues one pays for a full life

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a great advantage for a system of philosophy to be substantially true

Quote.Author: Sophia Loren
Quote.QuoteValue: If you haven't cried, your eyes can't be beautiful

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are the anchors that hold a mother to life

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: I would prefer even to fail with honor than win by cheating

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: Always desire to learn something useful

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is dependent on effort

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: I see that all of us who live are nothing but images or insubstantial shadow

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: Who seeks shall find

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: A human being is only breath and shadow

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no success without hardship

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: Not knowing anything is the sweetest life

Quote.Author: Sophocles
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness is ever the begetter of kindness

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Good seasons start with good beginnings

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Me carrying a briefcase is like a hotdog wearing earrings

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Players have two things to do. Play and keep their mouths shut

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Just give me 25 guys on the last year of their contracts; I'll win a pennant every year

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: We're the best team in baseball, but not by much

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I only had a high school education and believe me, I had to cheat to get that

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: My idea of managing is giving the ball to Tom Seaver and sitting down and watching him work

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: The players make the manager, it's never the other way

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to embarrass any other catcher by comparing him to Johnny Bench

Quote.Author: Sparky Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is the person who year after year reaches the highest limits in his field

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always inspired by other filmmakers, whether it's a shot or the way they handle tone

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing a documentary is about discovering, being open, learning, and following curiosity

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a little slow, so forgive me if I'm inarticulate

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a home phone number, and I like it! It's like a throwback already

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always amazed when any actor can decipher my direction

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: We can empathize as deeply as we can empathize

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to make whatever is exciting

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely enjoy getting to know people I find inspiring

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: Big emotions that are unexplained are really scary. At least to me

Quote.Author: Spike Jonze
Quote.QuoteValue: Is artificial intelligence less than our intelligence?

Quote.Author: Spike Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I do is always scrutinised. But that's all I'll say about that

Quote.Author: Spike Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it is very important that films make people look at what they've forgotten

Quote.Author: Spike Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I live in New York City, the stories of my films take place in New York; I'm a New York filmmaker

Quote.Author: Spike Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people who have faults are a lot more interesting than people who are perfect

Quote.Author: Spike Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of times, we censor ourselves before the censor even gets there

Quote.Author: Spike Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of times you get credit for stuff in your movies you didn't intend to be there

Quote.Author: Spike Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't dictate, you don't dictate to Stevie Wonder, not successfully

Quote.Author: Spike Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: What's the difference between Hollywood characters and my characters? Mine are real
